rules.prepare: cd $XPACK_SOURCE_DIR/eglibc mv linuxthreads/* libc mv ports libc
rules.build:
XPACK_NATIVE_ARCH="`$XPACK_BASE_DIR/script/config.guess`" XPACK_XTOOLS_ARCH="`echo $XPACK_NATIVE_ARCH | sed -e 's/-[^-]*/-cross/'`"
XPACK_TARGET_ARCH="i686-pc-linux-gnu" XPACK_TARGET_NAME="`echo $XPACK_TARGET_ARCH | sed 's/\([^-]*\).*/\1/'`"
export CFLAGS="$CFLAGS -fno-stack-protector -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE" export PATH="$XPACK_BASE_DIR/tools/$XPACK_TARGET_NAME/bin:$XPACK_BASE_DIR/tools/$XPACK_TARGET_NAME/sbin:$PATH"
. $XPACK_BASE_DIR/script/create-dirs.sh . $XPACK_BASE_DIR/script/binutils-pass1.sh . $XPACK_BASE_DIR/script/gcc-pass1.sh . $XPACK_BASE_DIR/script/kernel-headers.sh . $XPACK_BASE_DIR/script/glibc-headers.sh . $XPACK_BASE_DIR/script/gcc-pass2.sh . $XPACK_BASE_DIR/script/glibc.sh . $XPACK_BASE_DIR/script/gcc-pass3.sh . $XPACK_BASE_DIR/script/ncurses.sh . $XPACK_BASE_DIR/script/zsh.sh . $XPACK_BASE_DIR/script/binutils-pass2.sh . $XPACK_BASE_DIR/script/remove-diverts.sh
